00064 /*
00065 ** ToolKit Window Types
00066 ** In the future, AUX_RGBA may be a combination of both RGB and ALPHA
00067 */
00068 
00069 #define AUX_RGB             0
00070 #define AUX_RGBA            AUX_RGB
00071 #define AUX_INDEX           1
00072 #define AUX_SINGLE          0
00073 #define AUX_DOUBLE          2
00074 #define AUX_DIRECT          0
00075 #define AUX_INDIRECT        4
00076 
00077 #define AUX_ACCUM           8
00078 #define AUX_ALPHA           16
00079 #define AUX_DEPTH24         32      /* 24-bit depth buffer */
00080 #define AUX_STENCIL         64
00081 #define AUX_AUX             128
00082 #define AUX_DEPTH16         256     /* 16-bit depth buffer */
00083 #define AUX_FIXED_332_PAL   512
00084 #define AUX_DEPTH           AUX_DEPTH16 /* default is 16-bit depth buffer */
00085 
00086 /* 
00087 ** Window Masks
00088 */
00089 
00090 #define AUX_WIND_IS_RGB(x)      (((x) & AUX_INDEX) == 0)
00091 #define AUX_WIND_IS_INDEX(x)    (((x) & AUX_INDEX) != 0)
00092 #define AUX_WIND_IS_SINGLE(x)   (((x) & AUX_DOUBLE) == 0)
00093 #define AUX_WIND_IS_DOUBLE(x)   (((x) & AUX_DOUBLE) != 0)
00094 #define AUX_WIND_IS_INDIRECT(x) (((x) & AUX_INDIRECT) != 0)
00095 #define AUX_WIND_IS_DIRECT(x)   (((x) & AUX_INDIRECT) == 0)
00096 #define AUX_WIND_HAS_ACCUM(x)   (((x) & AUX_ACCUM) != 0)
00097 #define AUX_WIND_HAS_ALPHA(x)   (((x) & AUX_ALPHA) != 0)
00098 #define AUX_WIND_HAS_DEPTH(x)   (((x) & (AUX_DEPTH24 | AUX_DEPTH16)) != 0)
00099 #define AUX_WIND_HAS_STENCIL(x) (((x) & AUX_STENCIL) != 0)
00100 #define AUX_WIND_USES_FIXED_332_PAL(x)  (((x) & AUX_FIXED_332_PAL) != 0)
00101 
00102 /*
00103 ** ToolKit Event Structure
00104 */
00105 
00106 typedef struct _AUX_EVENTREC {
00107     GLint event;
00108     GLint data[4];
00109 } AUX_EVENTREC;
00110

00215 /*
00216 ** ToolKit Gets and Sets
00217 */
00218 #define AUX_FD                  1  /* return fd (long) */
00219 #define AUX_COLORMAP            3  /* pass buf of r, g and b (unsigned char) */
00220 #define AUX_GREYSCALEMAP        4
00221 #define AUX_FOGMAP              5  /* pass fog and color bits (long) */
00222 #define AUX_ONECOLOR            6  /* pass index, r, g, and b (long) */

00237 extern float auxRGBMap[20][3];
00238 
00239 #define AUX_SETCOLOR(x, y) (AUX_WIND_IS_RGB((x)) ? \
00240                            glColor3fv(auxRGBMap[(y)]) : glIndexf((y)))
